categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Pelex was a group of three stormtrooper transports used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

The transports attempted to destroy the Imperial frigate Lightning that attacked a small group of cargo containers Koss. The transports were destroyed by a single TIE interceptor. The event was recorded for the Combat chamber to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
